meanings.definition: A compound containing the perborate ion.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of perborates in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Perborates are commonly used in laundry detergents for their cleaning properties.
meanings.sent3: The perborates in the solution seemed to dance under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like the fizzing reaction of perborates in water.
meanings.sent5: The bright white color of perborates made them easy to identify in the mixture.

meanings.definition: To treat or clean with perborates.
meanings.sent1: She perborates the stains on the clothes before washing them.
meanings.sent2: Many industries perborate their equipment to maintain cleanliness.
meanings.sent3: The chef jokingly said he would perborate the kitchen to make it sparkle.
meanings.sent4: His words perborated her heart, leaving a lasting impact.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bubbles as she perborated the surface was oddly satisfying.
